    • Uses of TrainException in asgn2RollingStock

      Methods in asgn2RollingStock that throw TrainException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PassengerCar.alight(java.lang.Integer departingPassengers)
      Removes the given number of passengers from this carriage.
      java.lang.Integer PassengerCar.board(java.lang.Integer newPassengers)
      Adds the given number of new passengers to the number on board the carriage.
      Constructors in asgn2RollingStock that throw TrainException 
      Constructor and Description
      FreightCar(java.lang.Integer grossWeight, java.lang.String goodsType)
      Constructs a freight car object.
      Locomotive(java.lang.Integer grossWeight, java.lang.String classification)
      Constructs a new locomotive object with a fixed gross weight and classification code.
      PassengerCar(java.lang.Integer grossWeight, java.lang.Integer numberOfSeats)
      Constructs a passenger car with a known weight and a fixed number of seats.
      RollingStock(java.lang.Integer grossWeight)
      Constructs a railway carriage with a specific gross weight (i.e., the carriage's weight when fully laden).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TrainTests.testAddingFreightWhilePassengersOnBoard()
      Create test for adding Freight car while passenger on board Start with adding locomotive valid input, passengerCar valid input followed by passenger on board continue with adding freight car valid input Expecting TrainException
      void RollingStockTests.testAddingPassengerAfterAnotherPassengerBoarding()
      Check the return of board() method in PassengerCar in the following condition: - in first board, the PassengerCar taken newPassengers less than numberOfSeats - in second board, the PassengerCar taken newPassengers again so totally number newPassengers more than numberOfSeats Expected return = total newPassengers - numberOfSeats

      void TrainTests.testCallNextCarriageUntilReturnNull()
      Create test for the next carriage Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with another carriage valid input until return null Make sure that the next carriage return null if call above the bound
